page.title: 18Hedgerows.
page.content: Many of the hedgerows in this area are annually cut back, and only a few are left to grow naturally. {Stoke Rd,nr.Stoke Golding. } Approx. 900 years old. The following trees were identified in a 100 yrd stretch:-Oak,Crab Apple,Ash, Hawthorne,Shallow Willow,Crack Willow, Field Maple, Elder and Blackthorne. (1 variety represents 100 years.) {Shenton Lane, nr Dadlington. Approx.600 years old. Elder,Hawthorne,Elm, Ash,Field Maple and Dogwood. {Ashby Rd, nr.Stapleton. Approx.800 years old. Bullace, Hawthorne, Elder, Oak, Ash, Field Maple,Blackthorne and Elm.
